text: Three views of Hemipolygona recurvirostra, presented as preserved shell specimens with accompanying genera and authorship description Hemipolygona recurvirostra is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1829
title: Hemipolygona recurvirostra
